summary: honestly, there’s a lot of hate stuff talking about that one interview with brie and chris being super passive aggressive and...
body: honestly, there’s a lot of hate stuff talking about that one interview with brie and chris being super passive aggressive and putting one or the other at fault and saying they hate each other and it’s sad. i think it’s just one of those days where u just get off on the wrong foot for like one day. like u know when u argue with a friend and the atmosphere is a little testy the rest of the day? like that.

blog.name: thefancywerewolf
blog.title: Conspiracies Everywhere
blog.description:
Multi fandom blog

Currently still constantly missing gravity falls

Everything is on hiatus rip

He/him 18

body:
Apples are a fruit

Apples are a fruit

Most people know that

Probably because it’s just a thing that everyone is told and seen all the time

Because it’s true !

Apples are indeed a fruit

No one would think anything special about saying apples are a fruit

“ of course they are “ people would shout “ obviously apples are fruit , we do in fact know this information “

But some people are not convinced

They have such an intense love for apples that they want to show the whole world how much of a fruit it is

They write stories , and movies , and plays, and paint pictures

The Apple artists love their work , and although the world knows apples are fruit , seldom to people ask them to stop telling them this , besides , who doesn’t love a new spin on the classic “ apples are fruit “ statement we’ve grown to know and love

It’s timeless

Interchangeable

Amazing

Interesting

Action packed

Informational

What else could you need ?

The Apple lovers watch these and read these and feel so happy and content , they get tattoos they put it on signs they write it everywhere they can .

And the conversations start conversations of people everywhere always talking about apples being fruits always showing apples being fruits writing about apples being fruits , it couldn’t be seen any less in this wonderful apples are fruit society , in this apples are fruit world .

But one day someone thinks to themselves

“ what about pears ? Aren’t in fact- and correct me if I’m wrong - are not pears also a fruit ?”

And the Apple lover would respond

“ well sure there are, I mean don’t be stupid everyone knows that , it’s just not as interesting as apples being fruit , besides the pear being a fruit story is so overdone and boring , just stick with apples “

Now this peculiar pear practitioner would smile and nod and agree with the Apples are fruit fanatic but they haven’t heard the knowledge that pears are fruit .

Not once in their life in fact have they heard it said that pears are fruit but the pears are fruit fan decides why not try and change that .

The passionate peaceful pear lover decides to make something from the heart . The pear lover is much too critical of their self however , first it was a movie but no no that’s too much , they needed an audience they could better talk to , something easier so their first run wouldn’t be something so stressful .

‘ maybe a book !’

Thought the pears are fruit lover

‘ that should be significantly less worrisome ‘

But after some deeper research they decided even that was too much

It took quite a while to come up with something they really liked but eventually it happened . A pretty peaceful picture pop up book about pears . With paragraphs that were happy and told those who didn’t know pears were fruit that yes indeed they were too . Now all the dandy young pear fans would be oh so happy to know that apples aren’t the only fruit and that apples don’t necessarily have to be the norm

Pears can stand out just fine too

Because they really are fruit too

But for some strange reason the Apple lovers retaliate . This was the first pears are fruit story ever to be written yet Apple lovers would run up to the pear preformer and yell to her

“ we don’t need to hear this “

“ we get it all the time “

“ you’re gonna change all the Apple stories to pear ones now aren’t you ? I don’t want to give up apples and start tolerating pears in all my work “

And the artists and the writers and the movie makers and the movie goers ,

The critics and the children and their families and the Apple growers

All did everything they possibly could just to tear this book apart

They called it blasphemous with every page that they ripped out in their Apple exclusionist rage

And they turned them and they burned them and they left them to go un read

Because the only good pear book is a bear book that’s dead

The pear lover cried

“ why would you do this to me “

And the Apple lover responded

“ because it didn’t appeal to me “

The pear lover cried

“ but I’ve done nothing to you “

And before leaving the Apple man groaned

“ can’t apples be fruit too ?”

( if that sounds like bullshit good cus it is and that’s basically the entire “ debate “ surrounding female led movies when their are millions of male led ones , or black led movies Asian led movies non Christian led movies non straight led movies . If it’s not an Apple then it’s Apple exclusion and we can’t have a fruit basket if that’s all we ever see.)

blog.name: thefancywerewolf
blog.title: Conspiracies Everywhere
blog.description:
Multi fandom blog

Currently still constantly missing gravity falls

Everything is on hiatus rip

He/him 18

summary:
I just ... 
This Brie Larson bullshit train has been beyond annoying for so long because she’s being criticized for existing and...
body:
I just …

This Brie Larson bullshit train has been beyond annoying for so long because she’s being criticized for existing and if my marvel YouTube feed could stop being hour long rants about angry men telling me captain marvel/ Brie Larson are ruining a 20 something running connected movie tv show universe just because a woman had the lead that would be lovely . But I can’t even begin to get into that right now because what the hell is happening here .

Like this is such bullshit . This is a children’s book . Not a comic book . Not a movie . Not anything geared at an adult audience. We’re talking a children’s book for children and grown men probably 20-40 or so are mad that it exists . Because for some reason they feel girls are gonna know it’s ok to be a girl and girls can be superheroes too and we don’t need to “ overdo it “ but also want to apply that to every female role model that could possibly exist so no actually I think we do need to .

You wanna say there’s great female role models in movies / there’s plenty/ too many / whatever bullshit people want to say but name one that wasn’t just immediately shot down for existing .

Rey exists in Star Wars and for “ unrelated reasons” or because “ we get the point let’s get back to a male protagonist “ the new Star Wars movies get a ton of shit all the time

Captain marvel comes out and people want to say oh sure it’s ok to like girl characters but do we have to make a whole “ thing “ out of it ? Why can’t it be considered a thing just to make a movie . You don’t see a male main character and call it a thing or a primarily white cast and call it a thing or a movie without lgbt representation and call it a thing . But the second a movie like love Simon or black panther or captain marvel comes out somehow it’s inherently different than those other movies ? Somehow it’s a “ thing “ now .

How any of these people can expect little girls to look up to someone who’s like them and a real hero when the whole world says nothing but bad things about that hero for nothing other than her gender is so beyond stupid that I just can’t understand . And if your standard for “ getting the point “ is having 2 or 3 female led movies then how about you let us “ get the point “ about male led movies and you stop making those because of it . Your logic doesn’t make sense either way .

This is probably a long post already but whatever . This is just so beyond frustrating . I really don’t know what else to say about it I’m just fed up with people who get the entire world to tell them they’re great and the second someone says “ girls are great “ they feel that pointless need to chime in “ but can’t I be great too ? “

You can only be great if you can be accepting , no honestly that’s not even the right word , you shouldn’t have to accept that maybe women and men and everyone of every gender no matter what they identify as should be equal it should just be common knowledge . So you can only be great if you have the slightest shred of common sense .

I just …

This Brie Larson bullshit train has been beyond annoying for so long because she’s being criticized for existing and if my marvel YouTube feed could stop being hour long rants about angry men telling me captain marvel/ Brie Larson are ruining a 20 something running connected movie tv show universe just because a woman had the lead that would be lovely . But I can’t even begin to get into that right now because what the hell is happening here .

Like this is such bullshit . This is a children’s book . Not a comic book . Not a movie . Not anything geared at an adult audience. We’re talking a children’s book for children and grown men probably 20-40 or so are mad that it exists . Because for some reason they feel girls are gonna know it’s ok to be a girl and girls can be superheroes too and we don’t need to “ overdo it “ but also want to apply that to every female role model that could possibly exist so no actually I think we do need to .

You wanna say there’s great female role models in movies / there’s plenty/ too many / whatever bullshit people want to say but name one that wasn’t just immediately shot down for existing .
